entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IOException thrown when disk is full does not have correct hresult #100457
  • Task.Delay(timeout) completes before the specified timeout has expired #100455
  • Obsolete attribute impacts XML Serialization #100453
  • Shared framework .NET 8/.NET 9 applications and services randomly crash in real-world deployments #100452
  • System.AppContext.BaseDirectory returns path to directory content instead of path to directory #100448
  • [wasm] SignalR tests timing out #100445
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: BroadcastChannelWriter #100443
    Future
  • LdapConnection.GetPartialResults() fails with timeout in Linux #100442
  • System.IO.Tests crash in CI (Linux arm64) #100441
  • GetSpecialFolder on macOS returns incorrect folder locations #100440
  • Empty array allocated on the Frozen Heap for a Collectible type? #100437
    9.0.0
  • High probability of loading an Assembly with no Image #100435
  • [API Proposal]: System.Buffers : BuffersExtensions.AsStream #100434
  • [Question] How .Net application with dependencies works in Arm64 runtime/environment? #100432

Closed

  • Test failure Interop\\COM\\ComWrappers\\API\\ComWrappersTests\\ComWrappersTests.cmd #92200
  • Undefined behavior when the number of function parameters and the number of arguments does not match #99644
  • C4242 error when compiling CoreCLR on Windows with -msbuild #100207
    9.0.0
  • SDL signoff requirements - enable MSVC warnings C4242 and C4244 (libunwind) #99471
    9.0.0
  • StartTransportLayerSecurity(...) method throw an exception when using System.DirectoryServices.Protocols in version 8.0.0 on Linux #96988
  • .Net 4.8 HashAlgorithm.Initialize() is not called after as ICryptoTransform (i.e. in CryptoStream) thus providing incosistent experience (different hashes) #100438
  • [NativeAOT/x86] Enable SAFESEH #100430
  • Double.TryParse calculation result accuracy error in asp.net #99145
  • How to config the AOT compilation process #100232
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Change Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Environments fields to consts #100396

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: intial profild repair #100456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix "Cleanup some string operating functions" PR #100451
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser][wbt] SignalRClientTests - wait for selectors of all the buttons #100450
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • FixOptRepeat and force repeating #100447
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Weak interior handles #100446
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix allocation of empty array in the frozen heap for collectible types #100444
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix intermittent failures due to unalignment access #100431
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Support Swift error handling for reverse P/Invokes #100429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [cdac] Data Descriptor Spec #100253
    documentation, area-Meta
  • JIT: fix count reconstruction when a natural loop contains an improper loop #100449
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Update dependson for mono perf jobs #100420
    area-Infrastructure, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Reenable C4242 and C4244 warnings in libunwind #100241
    Security, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove requirement for building packs to run host tests and infrastructure around restoring test project assets #100324
    area-Host
  • Add more checking to `GenTreeArrAddr::ParseArrayAddress()` #100327
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix CA2022 warnings (Avoid inexact read with 'Stream.Read') #100352
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT/x86] Add SAFESEH support to assembly files and ObjectWriter #100433
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make sure we compact the LOH when aggressive GC is requested #98954
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Dynamic event support #99862
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • BlobBuilder.LinkSuffix/LinkPrefix need to Free zero length chunks #100039
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Add cryptographic operation counts to prevent process crashes #100371
    area-System.Security
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add type-specialized vectorized hash table container #100386
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Ensure that Sse3.MoveAndDuplicate correctly tracks supporting SIMD scalar loads #100417
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Getting vxsort working on Linux amd64 #98712
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Vectorized `GetNonRandomizedHashCode` #98838
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Replace FEATURE_EH_FUNCLETS in JIT with runtime switch #99191
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] Physical contract descriptor spec #100365
    documentation, area-Meta
  • JIT: Add separate ABI classifiers for x86/win-x64/SysV-x64/ARM64 #100276
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove DAM annotations from enum converter #100347
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix optAssertionProp_Update for IND of handle constant replacement #100422
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup NativeAOT math helpers #100375
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Several improvements / simplifications in Regex #100315
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Remove non INPLACE_RUNTIME NativeAOT paths, cleanup exceptions #100379
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • [RISC-V] WiP: Simplify flags for passing struct in registers #100080
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Implement `ShuffleUnsafe` methods #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Restore StubSecretArg from stack #100428
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert OAVariant interop to managed #100176
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • VM: Include generic instantiations in stack frames #96440
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • Redesign the frame layout to avoid the redundant computation of the stackOffsets #99278
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • STJ: Dispose enumerator on exception #100194
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Remove global spinlock for EH stacktrace #100427
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Use SoftFP ABI on linux-bionic-arm #100392
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix for stress failure when adjusting effective IP while stackwalking may put it on a wrong instruction. #100376
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Start moving over to official templates #99433
    area-Infrastructure, linkable-framework
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Experiments with runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #100389
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Make it possible to trim custom attribute artifacts #100395
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Add Task.WhenEach to process tasks as they complete #100316
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/8.0-staging] Always zero-init if object contains pointers #100426
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-29
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Review struct and enum projections in C# for CryptoKit dev templates #2533

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Update user-facing documentation #2536
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Consolidate HelloWasm IL projects #2535
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge feb24 #2514
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • Bring 1ES pipelines port over from runtime #2534
    area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Clean up our System.Text.Json references #39902
  • dotnet-format: Different formatting of C# 12 collection expressions depending on SDK version #39898
  • CA2022 error in RazorSdk tool source #39893
  • [ApiCompat] Include description in generated suppression file output #39892
  • Cannot uninstall ANY workload if any unsigned/development workloads are currently installed. #39890

Closed

  • [Feature Request]: Support reference aliases in implicit usings #39889

PullRequests

Created

  • Pin to 8.0.0 in framework builds for two components loading in VS #39901
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the compiling version to the latest MSBuild from that band to fix scanner issues #39896
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add workload config command #39888
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2417913 #39828
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Use System.Text.Json in Netfx build of MSBuildSdkResolver #39573
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Ingest new props file from installer and use it to auto-include Toolset Compilers package #39701
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Dotnet Cli Feature: `dotnet tool update --all` Updating all tools with one command #38996
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Update the msbuild version to a version that includes additional fixes #39830
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the msbuild version to a version that includes additional fixes #39641
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add `http` prefix when docker config detect a insecure registry #39840
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-29
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Collection expressions: require Add method callable with a single argument for class and struct types that do not use [CollectionBuilder] #8022

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update msbuild reference package to get clean on scanners #72812
  • ReflectionTypeLoadException: CodeGenerationParameterSymbol.get_IsParamsArray #72811
  • Proposal for Improvement of Error Message Regarding Null Propagation Operator #72803
    Backlog

Closed

  • IDE0300 triggered for `dynamic` target type #72640
  • Update `ConstructedNamedTypeSymbol` to use OneOrMany instead of ImmutableArray for type arguments #68933
    Backlog
  • Navigation to source link is broken #72638
  • Handle diagnostics from HostDiagnosticUpdateSource in LSP pull diagnostics mode #70188
    Backlog
  • [BUG] c# dev kit - high memory usage #69134
  • Feature 'Find usages' is currently unavailable due to an internal error #68320
    17.8 P4
  • Regions should be included in code block grouping #72641

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2418390 #72813
    auto-merge
  • Support ref struct implementing interfaces in `foreach` and `using` statements #72810
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Reapply "Simplify updating the primary workspace without passing in a version #72808
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72806
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Improve parser recovery around nullable types in patterns #72805
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Remove 'synchronize with build' internal functionality #72802
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix some issues with 'use collection expr' and dynamic expressions #72801
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update publish data after VS snap #72809
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.VisualDiagnostics #72296
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add user visible option for existing structure tag option #72807
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add support for nullable enum options #72800
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Enhance test #72804
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2418072 #72799
    auto-merge
  • Handle razor `@:` transitions as comments #72745
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: require Add method callable with a single argument for class and struct types that do not use [CollectionBuilder] #72796
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove unneeded value in build script #72783
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72798
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Change tfm to net472 #72797
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Params side of the design changes around Add methods #72771
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix assumption when getting related document IDs #72795
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Change CS8618 message: required to 'required' #72767
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Change how creation dates are specified in the SG api #72794
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Edit and continue diagnostic source #72787
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Avoid creating result temp for switch-expressions #69194
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Allow ref-like locals in iterators and async methods #72664
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async, 17.11
  • Update Rename UI to accommodate for getting suggestions automatically #72790
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add support for AIOSP to search only the current document or current project. #72293
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove ServiceHub config for desktop host #72793
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Experimental idea: Remove the global file-path-to-document-ids map at the solution level. #72792
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Provide option to only update source-generators on special events (like a build) #72494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update segmented collections from v5.0.2 reference sources to v8.0.3 #72687
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Merge latest bits from `main` branch into extensions branch #72684
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Disallow dynamic calls on ref struct receivers #72674
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Improve batching for document add / removes for reduced allocations #72791
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #54845
  • Perf regression: caching, multiple_queries, plainTextSansFilter #54844
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, multiple_queries #54843
  • blazor headcontent throws exception #54842
  • Quarantine CanResetSharedKey #54840
  • Let me map all routes (including Blazor components) from the application part to the specific path. #54839
  • Perf regression: plaintext_spring #54837
  • SignalR MaximumParallelInvocationsPerClient only run on one thread #54836

Closed

  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • .net core 是否在Aot支持反射功能这一块 #54817
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #54832
  • Possible account enumeration in reset password #54653

PullRequests

Created

  • Support resolving OpenApiPaths entries from document #54847
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Introduce a logger provider that counts warnings and errors #54846
    area-dataprotection
  • Quarantine CanResetSharedKey #54841
    area-identity

Merged

  • Use cached ILogger instances to avoid repeated creation of these instances #53200
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 9.0-preview4
  • Add entry-point APIs for OpenAPI support #54789
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Sync shared code from runtime #54797
    area-runtime, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • Avoid O(N) string[] allocations for N header values in GetCommaSeparatedValues #54808
    Perf, area-networking
  • update IdentityModel to latest #54601
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Handle JSON comments and trailing commas in user-jwts #54826
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution
  • Use SearchValues throughout dotnet/aspnetcore (part 2) #54804
    Perf, community-contribution, area-networking
  • Implement Redis distributed cache without Lua #54689
    feature-caching, area-networking
  • Change how the key ring cache is updated #54675
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-29
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • libsosplugin.dylib: CoreCLR host crash on macOS Sonoma 14.4 on arm64 #4551
    9.0.0
  • Error: No CLR runtime found (dump collected with 8.0.0) #4563
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update sos.md #4570
  • Support collecting GC collect only trace using a simplified profile #4568
  • Migrate diagnostics repo to 1ES #4567
  • Add support for the new ISOSDacInterface14 #4545

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Mac] Light up HideSoftInputOnTapped for Catalyst #21528
    .NET 8 SR4
  • [Android] TapGestureRecognizer on a parent View is not working if a child View has TooltipProperties.Text set and tapping on it #21527
  • MAUI app crashes on Android in debug mode and has errors in release mode #21525
  • Declared IsGestureEnabled = false but Flyout menu is still work on MAUI .NET8 Android #21522

Closed

  • SetAppThemeColor crashes with NRE #21503
    .NET 8 SR4
  • Running an iOS app using the command 'sudo dotnet build -t:Run -f net8.0-ios' gets stuck #20280
  • Interop registered singleton cant be used in Blazor Hybrid #20499
  • [Android]System.TypeLoadException: Could not resolve type with token 01000004 from typeref #21256
  • On Android when you add a NavigationPage to the FlyoutPage.Flyout, an exception is thrown #21515
  • Memoryleak VisualstateManager in ButtonStyle on Android #21389
    Backlog
  • Polylines make application unresponsive. #21292

PullRequests

Created

  • [android] improve FormattedString performance #21530
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • Light up HideSoftInputOnTappedChanged for catalyst #21529
  • BindableObject System.NullReferenceException when bindings queue gets messed up #21523
    community ✨

Merged

  • fix 21503 #21524
  • [xaml] improve performance in debug-mode #21460
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • [C] fix a leak in VSG #21484
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️

Updated

  • [Windows] Prevent image from covering text in buttons if the image is too big #21516
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Span] Improve formatting inheritance #21191
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [iOS] Fixed RadioButton text related properties not working #20366
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-radiobutton
  • [WinUI] Allocate less when updating gestures #21450
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, area/gestures
  • Previously selected item cannot be reselected fix #21490
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • [CI] Clean all yaml in the pipelines of warnings and errors and add a workflow to validate the yaml used. #21345
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Document NavigableElement #21507
    area/navigation 🧭
  • [iOS] Shell/NavigationPage TitleView #20959
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨, control-titleview
  • [Android] Span line height fix #20352
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label
  • Fix TabbedPage title displaying incorrectly #17039
    area/TabbedPage, community ✨, stale
  • fix issue in orientation of images #21458
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-image
  • Fixed entry text color [iOS] #20100
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-entry
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add ability to configure multiple query filters on a given DbSet and disable them individually/specifically. #33432
  • Upgrade Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore 8.0.3 Error #33431
  • Could not load type 'SqlGuidCaster' from assembly Microsoft.Data.SqlClient #33430
  • Identity insert fails when the target table is called `File`. #33429
  • Add an API to retrieve owned entries for a given EntityEntry. #33428

Closed

  • Query: review (JSON) materializer code for queries with NoTrackingWithIdentityResolution #33097
  • For "Contains" queries of numeric values, just use the value in an "IN" statement instead of casting, converting, or using JSON. #33423
  • ChangeTracking not working as expected when using Collections with backing field #33427

PullRequests

Created

  • Detect ambiguous InversePropertyAttribute on collection navigations. #33434
  • [release/6.0] Update sqlite 2.1.2 -> 2.1.7 #33433

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Onboard the official build to 1ES pipeline templates #33303
    tell-mode
  • Implement precompiled queries #33297
  • Introduce liftable constants to shaper to prepare for precompilation #33351

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-29
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Add Exclusion File Validation & Consistency #19243
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Remove 2.1-5.0 templates #19238
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Remove 2.1-5.0 templates #19237
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Remove 2.1-5.0 templates #19236

Merged

  • Enable roslyn for unified build #18769
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Migrate VMR pipeline to 1ES templates #19073

Updated

  • Move unified build sdk validation to a test project #19090
  • Enable scenario test execution in VMR build #19222
  • [main] Rebootstrap with latest changes #19145
